description: Number of 3 X 3 matrices whose determinant is 1 mod n.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..1000
formula: Multiplicative with a(p^e) = p^(8*e-5)*(p^3-1)*(p^2-1). - _Vladeta Jovovic_, Nov 18 2001For a formula see A064767.a(n) = A046970(n) * A063453(n) * A000578(n) * (A003557(n))^5. - _R. J. Mathar_, Mar 30 2011
prog: (PARI) a(n) = n^9*prod(k=2, n, if (!isprime(k) || (n % k), 1, (1-1/k^3)*(1-1/k^2)*(1-1/k)))/eulerphi(n); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Jun 30 2015
author: Benjamin T. Love (benlove(AT)preston.polaristel.net)
extensions: More terms from _John W. Layman_, Feb 16 2001
